title: Indian Summers: Episode 4 Scene Masterpiece
text: In this scene from Episode 4, Ralph and Madeleine entertain a special guest. Indian Summers, Episode 4 airs Sunday, October 18th, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
